name: Write 'n Stick Phone Message Pad, 2 3/4 x 4 3/4, Two-Part Carbonless, 200 Forms

reviews.name: Adams Business Forms Write 'n Stick Phone Message Pad, 5-1/4 x 2-3/4, 2-Part Carbonless, 200 Forms
reviews.reviewText: Use these all the time. Great value. Highly recommend.
reviews.title: Great Value

reviews.name: Adams Business Forms Write 'n Stick Phone Message Pad, 5-1/4 x 2-3/4, 2-Part Carbonless, 200 Forms
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Write 'n Stick phone message books with happy success for years. Because they stick they don't have a tendency to fall behind the desk and get lost when a breeze comes through the office on a day nice enough to have the windows open or when somebody is overly cranky and slams a door to make a point. They can be re-stuck multiple times before loosing their sticky. If you write fairly small there is plenty of room for writing notes. I recommend purchasing these from Walmart; the office supply stores charge twice as much for the same item.
reviews.title: Lost without it!

reviews.name: Adams Business Forms Write 'n Stick Phone Message Pad, 5-1/4 x 2-3/4, 2-Part Carbonless, 200 Forms
reviews.reviewText: Really enjoy the convenience of keeping a record of all messages in one place, and the sticky back eliminates the need for all those sticky notes if you're taking a message for someone else!
reviews.title: Helpful
